response.overview: Corporate downsizing expert Ryan Bingham spends his life in planes, airports, and hotels, but just as he’s about to reach a milestone of ten million frequent flyer miles, he meets a woman who causes him to rethink his transient life.
response.tagline: The story of a man ready to make a connection.
response.title: Up in the Air

titles.title: 直上云霄 / 寡佬飞行日记 / 八字没一撇 / 悬而未决 / 空中飞人 / 型男飞行日志
Up in the Air - Wie im Flug
Up in the air - Amor sin escalas
マイレージ、マイライフ：2009

results.name: Up In The Air wins Best Adapted Screenplay BAFTA
